user.title: Solar AC Controller setup
user.description:
Configure how the controller manages your AC zones based on solar production and grid usage.

Tip: Define zones in the order you want them to be activated. All settings can be adjusted later from the Options menu.

init.title: Solar AC Controller options
init.description:
Adjust sensors, zones, thresholds and safety settings.

Zone order determines activation priority. Panic settings protect your inverter from overload.

error.no_zones: You must define at least one climate zone.
error.invalid_solar_hysteresis: Solar OFF threshold must be lower than Solar ON threshold.
error.panic_too_low: Panic threshold should be safely above the Solar ON threshold.
